games.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

games.description: An action RPG set in a fantasy world filled with monsters and magic.

games.description: An action RPG set in a dark fantasy world created by Hidetaka Miyazaki and George R. R. Martin.

games.title: Hades
games.description: A rogue-like dungeon crawler where you defy the god of the dead as you hack and slash out of the Underworld.

games.title: Stardew Valley

games.description: A platformer about climbing a mountain, facing your inner demons, and overcoming challenges.

games.title: Doom Eternal
games.description: A first-person shooter where you battle demons from Hell.

games.title: Animal Crossing: New Horizons
games.description: A life simulation game where you build and manage your own island paradise.
